title: Employees with zero hours contracts in the UK 2000 to 2019
summary: Overall Employees in thousands has decreased over the Year.
Employees in thousands is slightly decreasing from 2002 to 2003, and finally roughly increasing from 2003 to 2005.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2002 and 2003.
The highest Employees in thousands, of value 156.0 was reached at Year 2002
Minimum Employees in thousands about 108.0 was reached at Year 2004
